map.item:
You will be shown a series of letter strings, one at a time. Your task is to identify whether each letter string you see is a target, and to press the corresponding button.
In this experiment, the target string is: [TARGET_LETTER]. However, there is a catch. [TARGET_LETTER] should ONLY be considered a target when it follows the string [VALID_CUE_LETTER]. If [TARGET_LETTER] follows ANY other string, you should no longer consider it a target. So, for example, if you see the following sequence:
[VALID_CUE_LETTER], [TARGET_LETTER], [INVALID_CUE_LETTER], [TARGET_LETTER]
only the second string in that sequence is a target. All the other strings, including the last one, are NOT targets.
When you see a target, press the left mouse button. For any other stimuli, press the right mouse button.
Try to answer as quickly as possible while still being accurate. Press either mouse button when you are ready to begin.
Press either mouse button to begin the next part.
